reasoning: Reporting incidence of new HCV infections. Global HCV incidence ~23.7 per 100k (2015), genotype 1b comprises ~22% of cases, estimated ~5.2 per 100k. Limited 2005-specific genotype-stratified data; estimate based on genotype distribution studies.
source: Global epidemiology and genotype distribution of hepatitis C virus infection; Mohd Hanafiah K et al. (2013). Journal of Hepatology.
